name: Community of Artists
description: The Arts community is a vibrant collective where students who are passionate about arts and creative expression come together to share ideas.

name: WAEC Preps Community
description: A supportive community for students preparing for the WASSCE, where they can share resources, tips, and succeed together.

name: Mathematicians of Tomorrow
description: A community for future mathematicians to collaborate, solve problems, and share innovative approaches to complex mathematical challenges.

name: JavaScript Titans
description: An active community of JavaScript enthusiasts and developers exploring the latest frameworks, tools, and best practices in web development.

name: Mobile Dev Association
description: A dedicated space for aspiring mobile app developers to learn, network, and build groundbreaking mobile applications together.

name: Young Einsteins
description: A community fostering curiosity and innovation, where students passionate about science and research collaborate on exciting projects.
